name: similarities (shibing624)
description: [项目级] Similarities: a toolkit for similarity calculation and semantic search. 相似度计算、匹配搜索工具包，支持亿级数据文搜文、文搜图、图搜图，python3开发，开箱即用。。来源: https://github.com/shibing624/similarities

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Similarities: a toolkit for similarity calculation and semantic search. 相似度计算、匹配搜索工具包，支持亿级数据文搜文、文搜图、图搜图，python3开发，开箱即用。

来源: https://github.com/shibing624/similarities
语言: Python
Stars: 900

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
pip install torch # conda install pytorch
pip install -U similarities
